item.title: digital garden
item.description: digital garden # single plot is my digital garden — I’ll add, amend, and prune ideas as they come. A space where I casually toss ideas and thoughts. “Gardens … lie between farmland and wilderness," says Mark Bernstein. “The garden is farmland that delights the senses, designed for delight rather than commodity.”
